name: Spider-Man 3: Invasion of Spider-Slayers
summary: Spidey's in a web of trouble! Razor-winged, bolt-firing, mechanoid Spider-Slayers want to slide and dice him! Electro and Scorpion are trying to fry him with bolts of electricity! But on-screen Spider-Sense and devastating new combat moves mean it ain't over 'till Spidey says it's over!
